name: PartyCraft
description:
You are stuck at night in a boring fish-town. Might as well make the best of it! Party all night with your party animal friends. Find boomboxes and disco lights, don't forget to supply enough booze and pizza, and perhaps spice things up with some glowing mushrooms, if you dare!

Instructions:

  • WASD to move around
  • (in proto version:) Press I / O to spawn / delete party people, and Y / H to spawn / delete items
  • Use combination of the Boombox and the Disco Ball to get people excited and dancing
  • Press primary mouse button to pick up item, F to throw it and Q to drop it like a sack of potatos.

Made for GGJ2021 by

  • Horatiu - code, initial idea, some dope tracks, voice of Pianoman
  • Nomi - characters, boombox, cassettes and other 3D. voice of DEATH
  • Nothke - code, interaction, glowthings 3D, Fishtankman idea and voice, & voice of Frogman
  • CornetTheory - jazzy trumpet song, voices of twerkfish and AliG
  • some donkus - wack mushrooms and Fishtankman 3D
  • Super Rocket Zach - voices of Pizzacato and Grandma
  • Ethan Muller - voice of dr Zdravo the Healthy

Extrajaminal credits:

  • Sandro T - Flooded Grounds 3D asset
  • Chelsey Kearney - Model of Bernie
  • Bernie - voice of Bernie
